item.description: This site is a fun joke based around my coworker’s use of Broadcast Storm to stand in for Bullshit. Do you even tangentially have anything to do with networking? If so, it’s the ultimate stand-in for emails, IMs, meeting titles, and more! Along with making shitty Jamstack sites and complaining on the Internet, I’m interested in: SaaS O365 InfoSec OSINT Blue Team Scripting Python Groovy PowerShell DevOps Ubuntu Puppet Docker
